svg.text: Pit Claw BBQ Controller - Wiring Schematic
Carrier Board (50x70mm perfboard) - All connections shown

g.text: 1. Set MP1584EN trimpot to 5.0V before connecting
2. 3.3V comes from WT32 regulator (do not supply externally)
3. ADS1115 ADDR pin tied to GND = address 0x48
4. All probe jacks are 2.5mm mono (tip + sleeve)
5. IRLZ44N gate threshold ~1.0V (fully on at 3.3V logic)
6. 8-pin ribbon cable carries I2C, GPIO, power between boards
